_header: If thou wilt been strong in fight
_description: Think on Christ — two couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
ȝef þu wilt ben strong in fithAn fornemen þe deuel is
                    mithÞenk hou loue dede crist to deyȝeOn cros mankende for to
                    biȝe
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 36.
